node.introduction: Many young javascript developers have got this question in their mind. Why we should use TypeScript over JavaScript? The answer to this question is not that obvious as everyone expects especially when even for the time being many huge starts-up still uses js over ts.
node.title: Why TypeScript is over plain JavaScript?

node.introduction: In this article, I would like to share with all of you guys my favourite VSC and terminal configuration. Because I'm very like the esthetic design my daily use apps have to looks pretty.
node.title: My VS Code configuration

node.content: Always when you start a new project need to choose a few standards for the new app. One of them is the way how you gonna be implementing style for your components. There is plenty of methods to do that but this time I would like to tell you about one - how I do this most often. This is about styled-components.
node.introduction: Always when you start a new project need to choose a few standards for the new app. One of them is the way how you gonna be implementing style for your components. There is plenty of methods to do that but this time I would like to tell you about one - how I do this most often. This is about styled-components.
node.title: My way to style!

node.content: If you are a young dad as I am and wondering how to find time for both baby care and code this post is addressed straight to you. When my daughter was born 6 months ago I thought that I'll never again find time for home coding and guess what - I was wrong! After 3 months I found my way how to deal with it and would like to share it with you - so let's make a cup of coffee and read!
node.introduction: If you are a young dad as I am and wondering how to find time for both baby care and code this post is addressed straight to you. When my daughter was born 6 months ago I thought that I'll never again find time for home coding and guess what - I was wrong! After 3 months I found my way how to deal with it and would like to share it with you - so let's make a cup of coffee and read!
node.title: How to be a daddy and still have time for coding
